headline: The Accord of Jagged Pieces
description: A dense sketchbook mosaic where red, olive, black, and white shards interlock without losing their edges. The drawing searches for harmony that doesn’t erase fracture—accord made from contrast, not smoothing. Glyph-like icons, eyes, and coils act as small totems stitching motion into pattern.
resonantThread: Fragments into harmony—mosaic pages that reconcile tension without erasing edges; glyphs as small totems marking waypoints

motifMap.meaning: broken forms arranged into working peace
anchors of attention; icons that bless the field
breathing room; boundaries that allow accord
